The real dominance index is: BTC total value as a percentage of global M3 (broad money).  The fake "Bitcoin dominance index" as it is today, is comparing apples with oranges. ICO tokens and "smart contract platform" tokens have nothing to do with global money.

7/ The SEC wasn't making a decision about all of the pending bitcoin ETFs today; it was just handling the next step in the process for the Direxion ETF.  It had absolutely no reason (or justification) to address the VanEck/SolidX ETF. The fact it didn't do so is meaningless.
